name: The Scarlet Chaos (itch)
description:
Join Detective Jack Haerrison and Detective Payge Brock on a murder investigation in the small town of Valdrew.

This is only the first chapter and a small bit of the second chapter for playtesting and first impressions. (Everything is a work in progress.)

Features and what to expect:

- WASD keyboard layout and controller support

- Widescreen 720p resolution, no black borders, F4 to toggle fullscreen/windowed

- No random map encounters, all enemy encounters are events

- Lockpicking mini game

- Interactable environments by way of moving and lighting things aflame

- Lore books and other immersive windows into the world of Kelaura

- Environmental story telling next to the main narrative

Let me know what you think!
